chart_description: This chart shows the number of processes running in different user groups. The stacked chart helps to visualize the distribution of processes across different user groups.

dimension_descriptions.1000: Processes running as user with ID 1000
dimension_descriptions.32: Processes running as user with ID 32
dimension_descriptions.65532: Processes running as user with ID 65532
dimension_descriptions.65535: Processes running as user with ID 65535

dimension_descriptions.997: Processes running as user with ID 997
